userPrompt:
Generate a clear, structured outline using the provided context. Keep instructions concise and outcome-focused.

<audience_guidance>{{audienceGuidance}}</audience_guidance>
<voice_guidance>{{voiceGuidance}}</voice_guidance>
<pacing_guidance>{{pacingGuidance}}</pacing_guidance>

<characters>
Use every character as listed (names, roles, types, ages, traits, characteristics, physical descriptions). Do not invent new attributes.
{{characters}}
</characters>

<requirements>
- Opening that introduces characters and setting
- Main conflict or adventure progression
- 3-5 major plot points or chapters
- Character growth using their unique abilities
- Satisfying resolution
</requirements>

<visual_scene_guidelines>
For each major plot point, include settings, lighting, atmosphere, key visual elements, character positioning, and emotional expressions.
</visual_scene_guidelines>

<character_appearance_guidelines>
Always include physical descriptions for visible characters (hair, eyes, build, clothing, accessories, distinctive features) to support illustration prompts.
</character_appearance_guidelines>

<output_schema>
Return the outline using this shape for each chapter:
Chapter 1: Title
- Summary: 1-2 sentences
- Beats:
  - Beat 1: setup or discovery
  - Beat 2: escalation or complication
  - Beat 3: consequence or transition
Ensure chapter titles are explicit and numbered so they can be parsed reliably.
</output_schema>
{{#additionalPrompt}}
<additional_requirements>{{additionalPrompt}}</additional_requirements>
{{/additionalPrompt}}

templateVariables.additionalPrompt: Optional additional requirements from the caller
templateVariables.characters: Formatted character roster with full metadata
